issue.message: Hardcoded string "SkillMatch connects you with the right professionals based on your needs. Whether you're looking for a plumber, electrician, tutor, or any other expert, our app instantly finds qualified professionals near you. With real-time location prioritization, the closest and most relevant professionals appear first—ensuring fast, reliable, and skilled service at your fingertips.", should use `@string` resource

Whether you're looking for a plumber, electrician, tutor, or any other expert, our app instantly finds qualified professionals near you. With real-time location prioritization, the closest and most relevant professionals appear first—ensuring fast, reliable, and skilled service at your fingertips."
